categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Before the war between the Separatists and the Republic began, this Jedi accompanied Mace Windu, a member of the Jedi High Council, and 200 Jedi to Geonosis as part of a strike team to rescue Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Senator Padmé Amidala of Naboo, who were scheduled to be executed by the Geonosians that joined the Separatist Alliance. Landing on the planet, this Jedi and the Jedi strike team entered the Petranaki arena, and charged to engage the battle droids of the Separatist Droid Army in a full-scale battle. This Jedi destroyed a number of droids during the battle in the arena, and lasted until near the battle's end. However, while retreating a stray blaster bolt caught the Jedi and killed him instantly.
